// === PAUSE / INVENTORY UI ===
// Objects: PauseOverlay (Sprite), InventoryPanel (Sprite), Text: UI_Pause, UI_Inventory
// Layers: UI — make sure overlay/panels live here.
// Keys: P or Esc toggles Pause; I toggles Inventory.

// Init
On start of layout
→ PauseOverlay: Set visible False
→ InventoryPanel: Set visible False
→ UI_Pause: Set visible False
→ UI_Inventory: Set visible False

// Toggle Pause
Keyboard: On P pressed OR On Escape pressed
→ System: Set timescale to 0 if timescale=1 else 1
→ PauseOverlay: Set visible to (timescale = 0)
→ UI_Pause: Set visible to (timescale = 0)
→ UI_Pause: Set text to "PAUSED"

// Toggle Inventory (only when unpaused)
Keyboard: On I pressed
System: Compare timescale = 1
→ InventoryPanel: Set visible to invert(InventoryPanel.isVisible)
→ UI_Inventory: Set visible to InventoryPanel.isVisible
→ UI_Inventory: Set text to "INVENTORY\n- Weapon: " & Player.Weapon & "\n- P1 HP: " & Player.HP & " / P2 HP: " & Player2.HP

// Optional: change weapon from Inventory (simple cycle)
Keyboard: On O pressed
System: Compare InventoryPanel is visible
→ Player: Set Weapon to choose("basic","spread","laser")
→ Player2: Set Weapon to choose("basic","spread","laser")
→ UI_Inventory: Set text to "INVENTORY\n- Weapon: " & Player.Weapon & "\n- P1 HP: " & Player.HP & " / P2 HP: " & Player2.HP
